name: So Long Earth
description: So Long Earth is an action puzzle platformer designed to tell the story of Dominique Fayar, a french mafia member who found refuge in space after Earth's destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster (x86 compatible) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB of video memory Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: The game is very light - it can run on very low-spec computers

reviews.review_text: First game i've picked up in a while that i actually want to play for more than 5 mins.  Though it does require you to use your brain :) not something i do with some other games but this one seems worth the effort plus it's fun and well made . Definitely worth the time imho ,an original and interesting game. An easy thumbs up from me.
